Response

class Response

Crafts and sends an http response to the client.

Properties

protected string $body The body of the response to be sent to the client/browser.

Methods

Response
setCookie(string $key, string $value)

Sets a cookie.

Response
setHeader(string $header)

Sets a raw header.

Response
setResponceCode(int $code)

Sets the http response code.

Response
setBody(string $content, boolean $append = true)

Prepare the body that will be returned to the client.

void
returnResponse()

Returns/echos the body to the client. Should be last thing called.

void
redirect(string $location, integer $responseCode = 302)

Redirect the client to a new location. Must be called before any other content/white space is sent to client.

at line 61
Response setBody(string $content, boolean $append = true)

Prepare the body that will be returned to the client.

Parameters

string $content The content that will be added to body attribute that will be returned to the client.
boolean $append Determines if we should append to or replace the current body attribute.

Return Value

at line 90
void redirect(string $location, integer $responseCode = 302)

Redirect the client to a new location. Must be called before any other content/white space is sent to client.

Parameters

string $location URL to new location. For example, https://www.google.com
integer $responseCode Default is 302 which is temporary. Use 301 for permanent redirect.

Return Value

void
